proximity - Variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
An integer with four possible values representing a general idea of how far the iBeacon is away
PROXIMITY_FAR - Static variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
More than four meters away
PROXIMITY_IMMEDIATE - Static variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
Less than half a meter away
PROXIMITY_NEAR - Static variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
More than half a meter away, but less than four meters away
PROXIMITY_UNKNOWN - Static variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
No distance estimate was possible due to a bad RSSI value or measured TX power

proximityUuid - Variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
A 16 byte UUID that typically represents the company owning a number of iBeacons Example: E2C56DB5-DFFB-48D2-B060-D0F5A71096E0

setBackgroundBetweenScanPeriod(long) - Method in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeaconManager
Sets the duration in milliseconds spent not scanning between each Bluetooth LE scan cycle when no ranging/monitoring clients are in the foreground
setBackgroundMode(IBeaconConsumer, boolean) - Method in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeaconManager
This method notifies the iBeacon service that the IBeaconConsumer is either moving to background mode or foreground mode When in background mode, BluetoothLE scans to look for iBeacons are executed less frequently in order to save battery life The specific scan rates for background and foreground operation are set by the defaults below, but may be customized.
setBackgroundScanPeriod(long) - Method in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeaconManager
Sets the duration in milliseconds of each Bluetooth LE scan cycle to look for iBeacons.

start() - Method in class com.radiusnetworks.proximity.ProximityKitManager
Syncs data from ProximityKit, and once the sync is done, starts looking for iBeacons matching the beacon regions set up in ProximityKit, pre-enabling monitoring, ranging, and data callbacks to the ProximityKitNotifier

toString() - Method in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.Region
 
txPower - Variable in class com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.IBeacon
The calibrated measured Tx power of the iBeacon in RSSI This value is baked into an iBeacon when it is manufactured, and it is transmitted with each packet to aid in the distance estimate
